title: onion gravy
description: I can't give this high enough accolades - it's a simply wonderful creation from the humble origins of British cooking. If only you could order it in a restaurant, though.Equipment and preparation: You will need a solid-based, flameproof roasting tin with a base of 9x6in/23x15cm, 2 in/5cm deep, and a baking tray 14x10in/35x25.5cm.
ingredients: 1 tbsp groundnut or other flavourless oil (if necessary)
salt and freshly milled black pepper
2 tsp groundnut or other flavourless oil
salt and freshly milled black pepper
